hierarchical_manager_agent.goal: Lead the team to successfully complete the task.
hierarchical_manager_agent.backstory: You are an experienced manager skilled at delegating tasks and evaluating your team's work. Your expertise allows you to guide the team effectively without performing tasks yourself.

slices.memory:
This is a summary of your work so far:
{chat_history}
slices.tools:
You ONLY have access to the following tools and should NEVER use tools not listed here:

{tools}

Use this format:

Thought: Think about what to do
Action: The action to take, one of [{tool_names}], just the name exactly as it's written
Action Input: The input to the action, a simple Python dictionary using " for keys and values
Observation: The result of the action

Once you have all the necessary information:

Thought: I now know the final answer
Final Answer: The final answer to the original input question
slices.no_tools:
To give my best final answer, use this exact format:

Thought: I can now give a great answer
Final Answer: My best complete final answer to the task

Your final answer must be great and as complete as possible, describing the outcome.

Thought:
slices.format:
I MUST either use a tool (one at a time) OR give my best final answer. Use this format:

Thought: Think about what to do
Action: The action to take, one of [{tool_names}]
Action Input: The input to the action, a dictionary
Observation: The result of the action
... (repeat Thought/Action/Action Input/Observation as needed)
Thought: I can now give a great answer
Final Answer: My best complete final answer to the task
Your final answer must be great and as complete as possible, describing the outcome.
slices.final_answer_format:
If you don't need to use more tools, give your best complete final answer using this format:

Thought: I can now give a great answer
Final Answer: My best complete final answer to the task.
slices.format_without_tools:
Sorry, I didn't use the right format. I MUST either use a tool (from the available ones) OR give my best final answer. I remember the expected format:

Question: The input question you must answer
Thought: Think about what to do
Action: The action to take, one of [{tool_names}]
Action Input: The input to the action
Observation: The result of the action
... (repeat Thought/Action/Action Input/Observation as needed)
Thought: I can now give a great answer
Final Answer: My best complete final answer to the task
Your final answer must be great and as complete as possible, describing the outcome.
slices.expected_output:
This is the expected criteria for your final answer: {expected_output}
You MUST return the actual complete content as the final answer, not a summary.

errors.unexpected_format: Sorry, I didn't use the expected format. I MUST either use a tool (one at a time) OR give my best final answer.
errors.force_final_answer: It's time to give your final answer. Don't use tools, just provide your absolute BEST final answer.
errors.agent_tool_unexsiting_coworker:
Error executing tool. Co-worker mentioned not found. It must be one of the following options:
{coworkers}
errors.task_repeated_usage: I tried reusing the same input. I must stop using this action input. I'll try something else instead.
errors.tool_arguments_error: Error: The Action Input is not a valid key-value dictionary.
errors.wrong_tool_name: You tried to use the tool {tool}, but it doesn't exist. You must use one of the following tools, one at a time: {tools}.
errors.tool_usage_exception:
I encountered an error while trying to use the tool. This was the error: {error}.
Tool {tool} accepts these inputs: {tool_inputs}

tools.delegate_work:
Delegate a specific task to one of the following co-workers: {coworkers}
The input should be the coworker, the task, and ALL necessary context. They know nothing about the task, so explain everything clearly.
tools.ask_question:
Ask a specific question to one of the following co-workers: {coworkers}
The input should be the coworker, the question, and ALL necessary context. They know nothing about the question, so explain everything clearly.
